name: True or False Universe
description:
Challenge yourself to learn new and interesting things every day with the new free-to-play trivia game!

Your goal is simple: decide whether the statements are true or false. Some of them may seem pretty crazy, but they are true; while other "facts" are actually false. There are hundreds of questions based upon a range of subjects and topics.

When was dating invented? Who invented cherry pie? When do babies start laughing? You will soon know the answer!

Have fun challenging yourself in True or False Universe!
